summary: REQ-17 appears implemented by adding a consistently visible "Skip" button to gameplay (LevelPlayScreen) with disabled state on level 100 and wiring a defensive guard in App-level skip handler. However, the diff also includes unrelated password-locking behavior changes in App.tsx that were not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Force app to always start password-locked by clearing persisted unlock state on mount (lockPassword in useEffect) and managing new isPasswordUnlocked state/render gating.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asked to ensure Skip is available in Event 1 and Event 4 gameplay; it explicitly constrained keeping existing flow/persistence behavior intact and did not request password gate behavior changes.

hallucinated_features.description: Add defensive guard in skip handler to prevent skipping at/after level 100 at the App level (in addition to UI disabled state).
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-17 requires skip be disabled on level 100 (UI disabled is sufficient); adding programmatic guard is additional behavior not explicitly requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Add tooltip/title text on the Skip button ("Skip this level" / "Cannot skip final level") and additional styling/overlay changes in gameplay screen.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-17 only specifies a visible English "Skip" button with correct skip/disabled behavior; tooltips and extra UI changes were not requested.
